channel.title: Germany on Baltic Security Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Germany on Baltic Security Foundation

item.title: U.S. Perspectives on Nord Stream 2
item.description: U.S. President Joe Biden has claimed that Nord Stream 2, the controversial Russo-German pipeline project, is a “bad deal for Europe” and has stated his administration’s opposition to the project.

item.title: Regional Activities
item.description: October 2019 has been busy for the Baltic Security Foundation, pursuing our goal of fostering and promoting Baltic defense and security.
